boardgame.description: Formula D_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute; is a fast-paced racing game in which the cars' top speeds are limited by having to end a certain number of turns in each curve of the racetrack. This can be tricky, because although players can regulate their speeds by choosing which gear to be in and each gear allows a certain range of movement, the exact amount is determined randomly. Great fun for a big group._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The base game comes with:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Includes 8 extra sets of tracks (each worth ~€10), for a total of 23 tracks. Not sure how many scoresheets still in box, but the 3lap-sheets have not been used. 1 set of painted metal cars (2003 colors of Ferrari, McLaren, Jaguar, Renault and Jordan) also included. Also includes world wide shipping (~€40). Box is used with a minor rip on one edge. Most tracks are like new or new.
